titleStmt.title: A soliloquy of the soule, or, A pillar of thoughts with reasons proving the immortality of the soule / written by Sir Richard Baker, Knight.
titleStmt.author: Baker, Richard, Sir, 1568-1645.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by T. Paine for Francis Eglesfield ...,

notesStmt.note: Imperfect: torn, stained and tightly bound, with loss of text.
Reproduction of original in the Newberry Library.
